summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank for the Jeffrey E. Epstein Insurance Trust, detailing account balances and transactions for February 2017. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and account management instructions.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the beneficiary of the insurance trust referenced in the document.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 575 Lexington Ave, 4th Fl, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: The document details the account balance of the Jeffrey E. Epstein Insurance Trust as of February 28, 2017.
The ending balance for the account was $259.05.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF return item fees for the statement period.
The document includes instructions for addressing errors or inquiries related to the account.
The document is marked as confidential pursuant to Federal Rule of Criminal Procedure 6(e).
